title: Processing Flow Timeline
description: Captures an array of time-profiling info, for every component of processing flow.

time-profiling.description: This datatype is used to store the time profiling information of any service or component.

xdm:componentName.title: Component Name
xdm:componentName.description: The name of the service/component, for which time information is captured.

xdm:serviceGroup.title: Service Group
xdm:serviceGroup.description: An optional attribute, to capture the timeline of a service, at sub-tree level.

xdm:startTime.title: Start Time
xdm:startTime.description: Execution Start time in Date-Time format for the component.

xdm:endTime.title: End Time
xdm:endTime.description: Execution End time in Date-Time format for the component.
